long_description:
Author: BingFengFSX(IFRFSX)  
Original Author: JP(https://github.com/kilbith) and Gambit(who is no longer active in the community).  
License: CC BY 4.0

Original Texture Pack's Information:  

>This is an update of the original PixelBOX texture pack by the brillant artist **Gambit** (*who is no longer active in the community*).

>>This pack is currently up-to-date with Minetest Game and supports nearly 100% of its textures.  
>>The original pack had wrong / outdated file names or missing textures.   
>>The textures themselves have been the least modified as possible for not alterating the artwork of Gambit.
name: iceflametexture
